pkgmetadata.longdescription: Project Invoice Module######################The Project Invoice module adds invoice methods on project.The methods are:- Manual: Tryton doesn't create any invoice.- On Effort: The invoices are created based on the *Effort* hours for all children works with 100% progress.- On Progress: The invoices are create proportionally to the *Progress* of the *Effort* hours of each children work.- On Timesheet: The invoices are created based on the timesheets encoded on all children works.
